  Kup: Elita, it looks like the squad going after your parents is almost there. They seem to be slowing down.
   
  (OOC: I threw that in just to get things going. I figured they should be about there now.)
   
  Kup: I havn't seen a shuttle leave Atlantis for The Ark yet though. That concerns me.
